jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Who you are:

eCabs Technologies is in a relentless drive to optimise its robust, multi-channel ride-hailing platform, currently deployed in three countries, and with ambitious plans for future growth in multiple regions. In line with our aspirations to be a key player in the international mobility industry, we are currently on the lookout for a iOS Developer. With a minimum of 3 years‚Äô experience working as a mobile app developer, you are proficient in Front-end and mobile technologies, have experience in building enterprise grade systems which are robust, scalable, highly performant and secure, have a proven track record or portfolio, and are open to learn the latest cutting edge technologies and patterns.

As an iOS Developer, you will contribute to the delivery of mobile app solutions which will play an integral part in the company's operations and data collection.
What you‚Äôll do:
‚Ä¢ Working closely with other team members you will craft clear user stories, write both unit and integration tests and continuously deliver incremental changes to the applications and common components.
‚Ä¢ Code, test and deploy using standard source control and continuous integration tools.
‚Ä¢ Do necessary research of technologies or patterns to ensure quality of products.
‚Ä¢ Take part in architectural design of the systems.
‚Ä¢ Writing clear and maintainable code that will be shared across multiple teams.
‚Ä¢ Providing constructive feedback during code reviews.
‚Ä¢ Help in the creation of solution definitions, working closely with Product Owners on refining task descriptions.

jobs_results.title: iOS Engineer
jobs_results.description:
We are KingMakers, a customer-centric tech startup, dedicated to creating innovative products that entertain our customers and keep them engaged both online and through our agency operations.

Since the successful launch of our first product, BetKing, in 2018, we have continued our momentum and will soon be introducing our newest offering, SuperSportBet, in South Africa. In partnership with the Multichoice Group and SuperSport, SuperSportBet enhances the passion that sports fans have for the game with a world-class sports betting and casino experience.

As our Kingdom expands, we proudly stand as the leading Sports and Digital Entertainment platform in Africa, and we are still actively hiring an exceptional team of Creators and Innovators across Africa, the United Kingdom, Europe, and the Middle East.

There has never been a better time to join our Kingdom than today!

Role Overview:

This is an individual contributor role with a considerable backdrop of professional experience in system design and development. In addition to technical expertise within their team, people in this role will be starting to have a greater influence across the business.

You will be expected to be able to turn your hand to any part of the software development lifecycle. This includes things like requirements capture, analysis, design through to implementation and to the delivery, test and ongoing support of systems.

At this level, there may be a focus on specialist areas such as specific domain expertise or technical leadership. Your role means you will produce high-quality, thoughtful software at scale and will reason through multiple approaches towards optimal outcomes. You can adopt practices that consistently achieve high quality outcomes and have a comprehensive knowledge and understanding of the working domain, anticipating common problems.

What You Need for This Role:

All with an emphasis on iOS
‚Ä¢ Minimum 4 years of experience in developing native iOS applications using Swift.
‚Ä¢ Extensive experience in modularization of applications using tools like Swift Package Manager (SPM) and CocoaPods to manage dependencies and split code into reusable and scalable modules.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience with architectures such as MVI (Model-View-Intent), MVVM, and MVC.
‚Ä¢ Experience with SwiftUI for building modern, declarative user interfaces.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in Code Review practices, ensuring high-quality code and adherence to best practices across the team.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Analytics tools (e.g., Firebase Analytics, Adjust) to track user behavior, optimize features, and inform product decisions.
‚Ä¢ Experience with A/B Testing to experiment and optimize the user experience.
‚Ä¢ Experience in performance optimization and local storage solutions.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Unit Testing and UI Testing using frameworks such as XCTest.
‚Ä¢ Experience with CI/CD, preferably with Fastlane, for automating tests, builds, and deployments.
‚Ä¢ Experience with RESTful APIs, third-party service integration, and mobile app architecture design.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Dependency Injection patterns to manage the creation and handling of dependencies in app development.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills and ability to work in a team.

Nice to have:
‚Ä¢ Experience with Async/Await for handling asynchronous code in Swift.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of cross-platform mobile development (React Native, Flutter).
‚Ä¢ Experience with Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) for shared development across platforms.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of backend technologies (Node.js, Firebase)

How you do it ‚Äì Expectations for fulfilling your role:

As a general rule at KingMakers we want people to be:
‚Ä¢ Customer Focus: We keep the customer at the center of everything we do.
‚Ä¢ Passion & Dedication: We are passionate about what we do, employing only smart, honest, dedicated, and results oriented team players.
‚Ä¢ Openness, Honesty & Directness: We embrace a culture of candor and work together towards the right solution whilst being open, honest, and willing to give and receive feedback, judgment-free. We play the ball, not the person.
‚Ä¢ Innovation & Big Thinking: We always look for ways to innovate whilst not losing sight of what's important. The bigger we think, the more we inspire, the better the outcome.
‚Ä¢ Ownership & Accountability: We think like owners. If we see a problem, we find a solution. We are pragmatic and always strive to do more with less.
‚Ä¢ Speed & Focus: We plan, we strategize, but mostly, we DO. Without doing, there is no progress, we can always change direction but only if we start moving. Fast beats slow.
‚Ä¢ Low Ego: The best solutions are achieved when we leave our egos at the door. We always seek opportunities to learn in every situation. No job too small.
‚Ä¢ Fun: On balance, we believe in having fun whilst working. We maintain perspective as best as we can, and together, we celebrate our successes.

Beyond our great company benefits and competitive salaries, we recognize that to grow sustainably and thrive positively we need to engage the right talent because our people are a merit to our success. We have an inclusive culture where everyone can thrive and where everybody has a seat at the table.

So, what are you waiting for? Click apply and join our Kingdom today!

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer - Fixed Term Contract
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for talented Mobile Developers with a strong focus on React Native to join our team as we build a new product line of customizable mobile applications for the iGaming industry. As a Mobile Developer, you will collaborate with the Mobile Tech Lead and other engineers to design, develop, and maintain mobile applications that provide unique experiences for each of our brands. You will be involved in all stages of the development lifecycle, from transforming designs and wireframes into efficient, high-quality code to ensuring the application‚Äôs scalability and performance. A strong emphasis on DevOps practices‚Äîcontinuous integration, continuous delivery (CI/CD), and iterative releases‚Äîis key, as we aim to release small, release often, and leverage rapid feedback loops to improve the product. Inicial contract of 6 months with possible extension.

Responsibilities
Mobile Application Development: Design, develop, and maintain mobile applications using React Native for iOS and Android platforms.

‚óè DevOps & CI/CD Mindset: Embrace a DevOps philosophy, promoting small, frequent releases, and continuous improvement through feedback loops.
‚Ä¢ Work closely with the Mobile Tech Lead to establish CI/CD pipelines and automation.

‚óè Component-Based Design: Build reusable, modular components and libraries to enable efficient development and maintainability across different brands.

‚óè Collaboration: Work closely with the Mobile Tech Lead, designers, and backend developers to ensure the mobile applications meet functional and technical requirements.

‚óè Testing & Quality: Focus on quality through automated testing, ensuring reliable and high-performance code. Implement unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

‚óè Feedback Loops: Regularly seek and incorporate feedback from stakeholders, end-users, and internal teams to improve the product iteratively.

‚óè API Integration: Work with backend teams to integrate RESTful APIs and other third-party services into the mobile applications.

‚óè Cross-Platform Consistency: Ensure the performance and quality of applications are consistent across iOS and Android platforms.

‚óè Documentation: Write clear, concise technical documentation to ensure maintainability and facilitate onboarding of new team members.
‚Ä¢ Experience: 4+ years of professional mobile development experience with a focus on React Native.

‚óè React Native Expertise: Deep understanding of React Native, including hooks, components, navigation, and state management.

‚óè Mobile Development: Solid understanding of mobile development for both iOS and Android platforms.

‚óè JavaScript & TypeScript: Proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+) and TypeScript for building type-safe, maintainable applications.

‚óè DevOps Mindset: Passion for continuous integration, continuous delivery, and iterative improvement, with a strong belief in releasing early and often.

‚óè Agile & Feedback Loops: Experience working in agile teams (Scrum/Kanban), focusing on iterative development, feedback loops, and rapid releases.

‚óè API Integration: Experience working with RESTful APIs and third-party serviceintegrations.

‚óè Version Control: Strong knowledge of Git for version control and collaborative development.

‚óè Testing: Experience with unit testing frameworks and mobile testing tools to ensure code quality and reliability.

‚óè Team Player: Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate technical solutions clearly.

‚óè Problem Solver: Analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues with a pragmatic approach.

NICE TO HAVE

‚óè Experience in the iGaming industry.

‚óè Experience with native development in iOS (Swift) and/or Android (Kotlin).

‚óè Experience with modern web development

‚óè Knowledge of third-party SDK integration (e.g., analytics tools, payment gateways,

geolocation services).
‚Ä¢ Hybrid Working Mode
‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours
‚Ä¢ Private Healthcare
‚Ä¢ GiG Wellbeing Benefit
‚Ä¢ Birthday Leave
‚Ä¢ Me time day off
‚Ä¢ Training and certifications

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Engineer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: European Union, France

Senior iOS Engineer
Location: EU Remote, Paris-based preferred (Hybrid)

üí° Why This Role and Why Now?

We‚Äôre at an exciting phase of the company where we want a new engineer to join to
(1) increase product velocity on iOS and Mac (we are at capacity with the current small team)

(2) distribute ownership of specific features and technologies (you will be given specific ownership within the team), working directly with Matt, Alec, Peter, Julien, Konrad

At Opal, we're building tools to help people reclaim their time and focus on what truly matters. As we continue to grow and save millions of hours of screen time for our Gems (our community), we‚Äôre looking for a Senior iOS Engineer to accelerate product development and take ownership of key features.

Here‚Äôs why this is the perfect moment to join:
‚Ä¢ Product Velocity: Our small, high-performing engineering team is at capacity. You‚Äôll play a key role in increasing the speed at which we deliver impactful features across iOS and Mac.
‚Ä¢ Ownership & Impact: You‚Äôll take the lead on specific technologies and features, working directly with our talented team of engineers (Matt, Alec, Peter, Julien, Anton).
‚Ä¢ A Thriving Company:
‚Ä¢ 100M+ hours of screen time saved to date.
‚Ä¢ $1M in revenue per employee projected for 2024.
‚Ä¢ Double-digit monthly growth with profitability.
‚Ä¢ Ranked among the Top-30 US Productivity Apps, alongside giants like Google, Microsoft, and Notion.
‚Ä¢ Backed by $7M+ from founders and investors behind generation-defining companies like Pinterest, Snapchat, Revolut, and Front.
‚Ä¢ Your Role in Growth: You‚Äôll be our 6th engineer, stepping into a fast-growing company where your work will directly shape the future of focus and productivity.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing

As a Senior iOS Engineer, you‚Äôll take a hands-on role in building and improving our app ecosystem:
‚Ä¢ Develop Core Apps: Design and build Opal for iOS, iPadOS, and MacOS.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate on Features: Partner with our product team to define and implement app features that delight our Gems.
‚Ä¢ Ensure Quality & Performance: Maintain the highest standards of performance, usability, and reliability across our apps.
‚Ä¢ Code Excellence: Create unit tests, address edge cases, and ensure code robustness.
‚Ä¢ Continuous Improvement: Fix bugs, enhance app performance, and implement updates to keep our apps ahead of the curve.
‚Ä¢ Innovate: Discover and integrate new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Support Our Gems: Address user issues and continuously improve their experience.
‚Ä¢ Share Knowledge: Collaborate and mentor within the team to foster a culture of learning and growth.

What You Should Bring
‚Ä¢ 5+ Years of iOS Development: Demonstrated experience building high-quality apps for iOS, iPadOS, or WatchOS.
‚Ä¢ Proven Track Record: Several apps published on the App Store.
‚Ä¢ Technical Expertise:
‚Ä¢ Proficient in Swift, SwiftUI, UIKit, Combine, and the iOS toolchain.
‚Ä¢ Strong Git knowledge and experience with Firebase or other cloud services.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with push notifications, APIs, and cloud messaging.
‚Ä¢ Experience with a range of third-party libraries and APIs.
‚Ä¢ Quality-Driven: Skilled in creating unit tests and working with continuous integration.
‚Ä¢ Independent & Resourceful: Able to take initiative, resolve ambiguity, and work effectively with limited direction.
‚Ä¢ Aligned with Our Mission: A passion for saving people‚Äôs time, improving their well-being, and mindfulness.
‚Ä¢ AI Enthusiast: Interest in hacking or artificial intelligence.

Why Opal?
‚Ä¢ Mission-Driven Impact: Save time and empower intentional living‚Äî100M+ hours saved and counting.
‚Ä¢ Ownership & Flexibility: Structure your work to foster creativity and productivity.
‚Ä¢ Collaborative Culture: Work with a small, high-impact team that gathers quarterly for meetups and learning.
‚Ä¢ Growth & Recognition: Join a top-30 US productivity app with competitive compensation and early equity.
‚Ä¢ Well-Supported: Backed by world-class investors and founders of companies like Pinterest, Snapchat, and Revolut.

If you‚Äôre ready to shape the future of focus and productivity, we‚Äôd love to meet you!

This offer from "Opal" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
Medior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
Mobile App Developer (React Native)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Latin America

APPLICATION DEADLINE: December 15th CET
Keep in mind that we will only start reviewing the applications once the deadline is over.

Bitrefill is the leading crypto e-commerce site worldwide, fostering a circular economy that allows people to opt out from the traditional banking systems and embrace freedom. We make it easy for people to live on crypto around the world.

Does this sound like something to you? Then keep reading :)
Your Mission:

As our Mobile App Developer, you will work on migrating the current web-based experience of Bitrefill into native mobile for iOS and Android. A large percentage of our users are mobile and your job will be ensuring that they have the best possible experience using Bitrefill on the app.

Relevant UX adaptations of the web-based flow will be done for the respective platforms as appropriate, as well as building out features only available on native apps, such as native login, inter-app communication, push notifications, and much more.
Our Tech Stack:
‚Ä¢ Node/TypeScript
‚Ä¢ React
‚Ä¢ React Native
‚Ä¢ MongoDB, MySQL

Your Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Responsibility for the UX, functionality and speed of our app and commercial platform;
‚Ä¢ Building and deploying new code, features and products, as well as maintaining and improving old code;
‚Ä¢ Working closely with our Communications and Management Teams to ensure optimal prioritization and streamlined deployment;
‚Ä¢ Being metrics driven - continuously evaluate that what we're doing is working, helping users understand what Bitrefill is and how to best use it;
‚Ä¢ Being able to understand and work with pre-existing codebase and navigate it independently;
‚Ä¢ Be hungry to learn, fast to execute, do a lot with little, and care strongly about your product and users;
‚Ä¢ Be a team player and a good friend who will contribute to our unpretentious culture.

You bring with you:
‚Ä¢ You reside in: EU/Americas timezones
‚Ä¢ You have a minimum of 3+ years of Mobile app development experience and 5+ years of general programming experience
‚Ä¢ You have frontend development skills with a focus on React Native and TypeScript
‚Ä¢ A strong digital portfolio that demonstrates the above
‚Ä¢ Strong written and verbal communication skills

It's a plus if you also:
‚Ä¢ Have a big influence on the product, so a good sense of UX / design is a strong advantage;
‚Ä¢ Crypto experience is not a requirement but a strong plus - we‚Äôll teach you what you need to know, but you need to have a passion for the movement;
‚Ä¢ Have an understanding of native languages (Swift, Objective-C, Java and Kotlin) and React Native Modules;
‚Ä¢ Experience integrating third party services.

We Offer:

Bitrefill believes in the freedom to work remotely and offering our team members flexibility. We‚Äôve built our entire business around this. Have no fear; you will never feel lonely, and you'll have the chance to meet your coworkers in person at our biannual team retreats. Here are some reasons people choose us:

- To become part of a talented team with high ambitions for a world where crypto is money for everyday use

- A challenging workplace and a great education when it comes to everything involving cryptocurrency

- Besides a competitive salary, we offer outstanding perks and benefits to make your experience at Bitrefill the best:
‚Ä¢ Option to get paid in crypto - at Bitrefill we walk the walk!
‚Ä¢ Freedom to work from anywhere (with a reliable and strong internet connection)!
‚Ä¢ Computer with necessary accessories
‚Ä¢ Remote Workspace Allowance - Ergonomic chairs and desks are an important part of a good home office
‚Ä¢ Educational Allowance - 300‚Ç¨ per year + subscriptions on the most enrichment learning platforms in the market!
‚Ä¢ Biannual team retreats consist of two get-togethers every year (which means, get your passport ready!)
‚Ä¢ 25 paid vacation days + a number of days to spend on your own country's national holidays!
‚Ä¢ Paid parental leave - here, your work adapts to your personal life, not the other way around!
‚Ä¢ Wellness Allowance - 600‚Ç¨ per year - important to get you moving when you sit all day in front of a computer!
‚Ä¢ Global Health Insurance - We want to give you wings so you can fly high but you have to be safe after all!

APPLICATION DEADLINE: December 15th CET
Keep in mind that we will only start processing the applications once the deadline is over.

Disclaimer

Please be aware of potential recruitment scams. Bitrefill will never ask you for money during the recruitment process.

All our communication happens via our official/career site email addresses (@message.teamtailor.com, @bitrefill.com) and only after applying via Teamtailor Careers site.

This offer from "Bitrefill" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
Are you excited about shaping the future of sports betting technology? Join the Sportsbook team and contribute to our in-house Sportsbook platform that hosts multiple brands. Our sophisticated system leverages Java for robust development, Kafka for real-time data streaming, and Spring Boot for creating powerful services. You‚Äôll work with various live sports feed integrations and utilise RabbitMQ for efficient message handling.
Our platform is engineered for high performance, ensuring high availability and scalability to handle high throughput and peak loads. We also prioritise rigorous performance testing to maintain superior reliability and speed.
If you‚Äôre passionate about cutting-edge technology and want to make a significant impact in the sports betting industry, we want to hear from you!"

When it comes to being successful at Sportserve, there's more to it than just being really good at the technical stuff. It's also your ability to be an awesome problem solver. And here's the thing, we totally get that we can't all be experts in everything, right? So, it's all about having that thirst for knowledge and being passionate about learning. You'll also need amazing attention to detail, so if something seems off, you won't rest until you've figured out what's going on. We see ourselves as a cool group of people who love coming up with new ideas and making things happen. As long as you have a true passion for creating awesome stuff, you'll fit right in.

What you'll be getting up to:
‚Ä¢ Develop mobile apps based on technical and functional specifications provided by the business.
‚Ä¢ Continued maintenance, development, and bug fixes for the existing mobile application.
‚Ä¢ Utilise source control tools such as Gitlab for maintaining code versioning and releases.
‚Ä¢ Test the app on different mobile devices and identify any technical problems.
‚Ä¢ Work with the team to manage, optimise and customise multiple mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Attend daily meetings to report on assigned tasks‚Äô progress and attend fortnightly meetings for project planning and other meetings from time to time.
‚Ä¢ Complete tasks & deliver projects on time and to the highest standards.
‚Ä¢ Contribute ideas for making the application better and easier to use.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or any related technical field.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of working experience in mobile development.
‚Ä¢ 2-3+ years of working with the Flutter framework.
‚Ä¢ Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
‚Ä¢ Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.
‚Ä¢ Must have built at least two Android and/or iOS apps with Flutter.
‚Ä¢ Ability to write and interpret technical documentation.
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle, including automated testing and building.
‚Ä¢ Experience working in an agile development process.
‚Ä¢ Be proficient in using version control and continuous integration, with tools like GIT.
‚Ä¢ Write clear, maintainable and testable code that you are proud of.
‚Ä¢ Good oral and written English communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Ability to work in a team and work well under pressure and deadlines.
‚Ä¢ Ability to organise and manage multiple priorities.
‚Ä¢ Independent but collaborative, driven, and assertive.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge about the Clean Architecture and SOLID principles.

Nice to have:
‚Ä¢ Experience in the online gaming industry or similar domains.
‚Ä¢ Background in continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD).
‚Ä¢ Understanding of automated testing for mobile apps.
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving and organizational skills.
‚Ä¢ Ability to adapt and manage multiple priorities effectively.
‚Ä¢ *We warmly invite applications in English.

Diversity & Inclusion at Sportserve

At Sportserve, we are deeply committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace. We believe in building a team that reflects a wide array of backgrounds, skills and perspectives. Embracing diversity not only enriches our work culture but also drives innovation and excellence. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer, where everyone‚Äôs contribution is valued and respected.

If you‚Äôre a passionate about technology and looking to start your career in an international, forward-thinking Sports Betting company, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply now to become part of our exciting journey!

apply_options.title: MEVP Job Board - Middle East Venture Partners

jobs_results.title: Senior Developer Advocate
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: United States, EMEA

About us:

RevenueCat makes building, analyzing, and growing mobile subscriptions easy. We launched as part of Y Combinator's summer 2018 batch and today are handling more than $4B of in-app purchases annually across thousands of apps.

We are a mission driven, remote-first company that is building the standard for mobile subscription infrastructure. Top apps like VSCO, Notion, and ClassDojo count on RevenueCat to power their subscriptions at scale.

Our 80 team members (and growing!) are located all over the world, from San Francisco to Madrid to Taipei. We're a close-knit, product-driven team, and we strive to live our core values: Customer Obsession, Always Be Shipping, Own It, and Balance.

The Role

RevenueCat helps apps of all shapes and sizes make more money across mobile, the web, and other platforms like Roku and Amazon. As a result, many different types of users log in to ‚Äì and use ‚Äì RevenueCat on a day-to-day basis. Product managers, support reps, lifecycle marketers, user acquisition specialists, data analysts, executives: The list goes on.

None of those users would make it onto RevenueCat unless a developer implements it first. And for smaller apps, developers are these users: They do the marketing, provide support, interpret the performance data, make pricing and packaging decisions, and more.

We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Developer Advocate to help ensure these developers are successful when using RevenueCat. You‚Äôd join forces with our current Advocate, and guy you might have seen walking around Seoul in the rain, Charlie Chapman. We‚Äôre specifically looking for someone with strong skills in producing written educational content targeted at developers that is technical but engaging. Your work will educate existing RevenueCat users, attract new search traffic, and position RevenueCat as the go-to resource when implementing in-app purchases across platforms.

What you‚Äôll be responsible for

Your primary responsibility will be creating high-quality, developer-focused content focused on monetization and in-app purchases. This includes both scenarios where developers use RevenueCat to solve for these use cases, as well as alternative implementations.

Examples of the type of content we‚Äôd expect you to produce include blogpost with titles like:
‚Ä¢ "Migrating a native subscription app to Flutter: A step by step plan"
‚Ä¢ "Implementing your first subscription with RevenueCat: Disable ads for paid users"
‚Ä¢ "How to detect and highlight the platform of purchase for cross-device subscribers"
‚Ä¢ "Adding a multi-tier subscription to your Expo app"

In addition to writing, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Speak at conferences, webinars, and other events to share insights and represent RevenueCat
‚Ä¢ Record videos and collaborate on webinars to help developers implement and succeed with RevenueCat
‚Ä¢ Work cross-functionally to develop resources that support developers using RevenueCat

Within the first month, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Learn RevenueCat inside and out
‚Ä¢ Familiarize yourself with our developer community and how to engage them
‚Ä¢ Have produced your first pieces of RevenueCat content

Within the first 3 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with Charlie on a joint content strategy playing to both your strengths
‚Ä¢ Independently research and develop content to fill current gaps in our documentation and other educational efforts
‚Ä¢ Repurpose existing content into new formats (e.g., blog posts into videos) to expand our reach

Within the first 6 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Represent RevenueCat at industry conferences and webinars, delivering talks and engaging with developers
‚Ä¢ Support product launches with technical content (written or video)

After 12 months, you‚Äôll have:
‚Ä¢ Become a fixture across the developer community, having become synonymous with RevenueCat and in-app monetization for Android, Flutter, and/or React Native
‚Ä¢ Found new and novel ways to help us engage developers (think Shipaton, App Store Rejection socks, and similar initiatives)

About you

You‚Äôre passionate about teaching and helping developers thrive. You‚Äôre deeply experienced in app development, particularly subscription apps, whether as part of a team or through indie projects (preferably both).

What you‚Äôll need to be successful
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in app development or developer-focused roles, ideally in a subscription app environment, with a deep understanding of at least one major mobile development platform (Android, Flutter, React Native preferred; iOS a strong alternative) and the ability to learn and write about others
‚Ä¢ Strong independent project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple content initiatives, events, and deadlines across time zones without constant oversight
‚Ä¢ Excellent technical communication skills, capable of translating complex technical concepts into accessible and engaging written, video, and spoken formats for developers
‚Ä¢ A passion for teaching and empowering developers, with the ability to create content that educates and inspires action, including blog posts, tutorials, and videos
‚Ä¢ Proven ability to learn and explain new technologies, with expertise in Android development, Flutter, or React Native preferred (experience with iOS development is a plus if paired with a demonstrated ability to adapt to and write about other platforms)
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in producing content for a developer audience, preferably in a professional capacity as a developer advocate, but we‚Äôd consider exceptional candidates that have written, recorded video, and have spoken at conferences targeted at developers as a hobby or side-project
‚Ä¢ Resourcefulness and adaptability, with a problem-solving mindset to navigate the challenges of engaging a global developer community
‚Ä¢ Outcome-driven approach, ensuring your efforts lead to measurable impacts, such as increased content engagement, developer onboarding, and community growth
‚Ä¢ Comfort with a fully remote, asynchronous work environment, and tools like Notion, Zoom, Slack, and Linear. You‚Äôll need to thrive in an environment that balances collaboration with ample time for focused, deep work

We‚Äôre looking for someone who embodies our team‚Äôs core values of agency and intellectual curiosity: taking initiative, solving problems, and continually learning to better serve our diverse developer audience. Regular travel may occasionally be required for conferences, events, or team gatherings.

What we offer:
‚Ä¢ $212,000 USD salary, regardless of location
‚Ä¢ Competitive equity in a fast-growing, Series C startup backed by top-tier investors, including Y Combinator
‚Ä¢ 10-year window to exercise vested equity options
‚Ä¢ Fully remote and flexible work environment
‚Ä¢ 4-5 weeks of suggested time off annually for mental, physical, and emotional recharge
‚Ä¢ $2,000 USD for workspace setup and $1,000 USD annual stipend for continuous learning

Curious about the interview process? Discover more in our blog post about how we hire and learn tips to help you succeed.

This offer from "RevenueCat" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 90% flex score.

Outcome-driven approach, ensuring your efforts lead to measurable impacts, such as increased content engagement, developer onboarding, and community growth

You‚Äôll need to thrive in an environment that balances collaboration with ample time for focused, deep work

We‚Äôre looking for someone who embodies our team‚Äôs core values of agency and intellectual curiosity: taking initiative, solving problems, and continually learning to better serve our diverse developer audience
Regular travel may occasionally be required for conferences, events, or team gatherings

job_highlights.title: Benefits
items: $212,000 USD salary, regardless of location
Competitive equity in a fast-growing, Series C startup backed by top-tier investors, including Y Combinator
10-year window to exercise vested equity options
Fully remote and flexible work environment
4-5 weeks of suggested time off annually for mental, physical, and emotional recharge
$2,000 USD for workspace setup and $1,000 USD annual stipend for continuous learning

job_highlights.title: Responsibilities
items: Product managers, support reps, lifecycle marketers, user acquisition specialists, data analysts, executives: The list goes on
None of those users would make it onto RevenueCat unless a developer implements it first
And for smaller apps, developers are these users: They do the marketing, provide support, interpret the performance data, make pricing and packaging decisions, and more
Your work will educate existing RevenueCat users, attract new search traffic, and position RevenueCat as the go-to resource when implementing in-app purchases across platforms
Your primary responsibility will be creating high-quality, developer-focused content focused on monetization and in-app purchases
This includes both scenarios where developers use RevenueCat to solve for these use cases, as well as alternative implementations
"Migrating a native subscription app to Flutter: A step by step plan"
"Implementing your first subscription with RevenueCat: Disable ads for paid users"
"How to detect and highlight the platform of purchase for cross-device subscribers"
"Adding a multi-tier subscription to your Expo app"
Speak at conferences, webinars, and other events to share insights and represent RevenueCat
Record videos and collaborate on webinars to help developers implement and succeed with RevenueCat
Work cross-functionally to develop resources that support developers using RevenueCat
Learn RevenueCat inside and out
Familiarize yourself with our developer community and how to engage them
Have produced your first pieces of RevenueCat content
Collaborate with Charlie on a joint content strategy playing to both your strengths
Independently research and develop content to fill current gaps in our documentation and other educational efforts
Repurpose existing content into new formats (e.g., blog posts into videos) to expand our reach
Represent RevenueCat at industry conferences and webinars, delivering talks and engaging with developers
Support product launches with technical content (written or video)

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ
